en-US.find_events: Discover shows, festivals, plays, and the best of what happens in the South of Brazil.
en-US.grabs_events: Collects events from several websites scattered on the web.
en-US.formats_them: Displays them in a friendly and easily searchable way.
en-US.sends_notification: Sends you daily notifications about new events.
